<title

    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Continuous Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2588) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Elemental Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=2580)

</column>

---

You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.
name: Continuous Assault
